home.description: We are a Collection of Craftsmen

mission.statement_intro: Bakasho is an organization with one goal - disseminate open source software.
mission.statement_p1: We are a collective group of individuals building software products which strive solve real world problems that are either seldom addressed or lacking an innovative open source solution.
mission.statement_p2: Every phase of the process, from the initial business plan to application code to realtime analytics is openly available to everyone.
mission.statement_p3: We believe providing these resources to everyone is essential, not only to spread knowledge and aid those who wish to learn, but also as a core fundament to building a transparent organization and a better global society, because we are not just a software company we are a collective and we are our customers.
